title: Minimalist Solid A-Line Midi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a minimalist solid-color A-line midi dress, sleeveless with clean round neckline, soft drape, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and subtle topstitching, isolated on plain white background, no model, no mannequin, no human, commercial ready-to-wear style
techpack: A-line midi dress in solid lightweight cotton twill with viscose blend lining. Sleeveless, round neckline, invisible side zipper closure, self-fabric waist tie for adjustable fit. Topstitch detailing along hem and neckline. Seam allowance 1cm, hem allowance 3cm.
provenance: Designed based on solids/minimalist trend for commercial ready-to-wear.
design_text:
